org.openimaj.vis.general

Class XYZVisualisation3D<D>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.vis.Visualisation3D<List<XYZVisualisation3D.LocatedObject3D<D>>>
      • org.openimaj.vis.general.XYZVisualisation3D<D>
  • Type Parameters:
    D - Plottable item
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventListener, javax.media.opengl.GLEventListener, AnimatedVisualisationProvider, Visualisation<List<XYZVisualisation3D.LocatedObject3D<D>>>, VisualisationImageProvider
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DotPlotVisualisation3D, Rectangle3DPlotter

    public class XYZVisualisation3D<D>
extends Visualisation3D<List<XYZVisualisation3D.LocatedObject3D<D>>>
    3 dimensional plot of objects. This class provides the axes and the rendering context in which items may be plotted. Provide an ItemPlotter3D for plotting the items in the visualisation.
    Version:
    $Author$, $Revision$, $Date$
    Author:
    David Dupplaw (dpd@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
    Created:
    11 Jul 2013
